name: Aragon
bio: Perpetually on the edge of academic disaster, Aragon juggles alchemical gains, missed exams, and suspiciously vanilla-scented 'protein' potions. Known for getting stuck in Edgemoor, celebrating his birthday in a chokehold with slugs and bats, and somehow surviving it all.

name: Katrina
bio: Battling spell exams, a runaway frog familiar, and a complicated romantic history, Katrina is the embodiment of 'it’s complicated.' Rumors swirl about lovers lost in the woods and exes who changed more than just majors.

name: Rowan
bio: On the verge of uncovering the truth connecting life and death, Rowan walks the thin line between research and revelation. Their studies may redefine what it means to graduate alive.

name: Percy
bio: Seen tiptoeing near the faculty lounge with a cloak of invisibility that only works on Tuesdays, Percy is suspected in everything from exam paper heists to glitter-hexed vending machines.

name: Kaelin Thorne
bio: Once plagued by chronic arcane fatigue, Kaelin found unexpected relief through Water Dancing. Now a quiet champion of the Hydroharmonic Effect, they’re living proof that math, magic, and motion can heal.

name: Albus Dumbledore
bio: Chronicler of campus chaos, Albus turns rumors, research, and reckless student behavior into polished columns. If it happened at Strixhaven, it probably passed across his desk.
